about_the_game:
Dive into a multiverse where everything is possible: romance, new meetings, adventures and even mystery. Choose the story you like or go through all, living many lives.

Untold Love Stories is a collection of short visual novels in different genres and art styles. You have to play for the main characters and make choices that will determine their destiny.

Unexpected Meeting (episode 1) is a spicy visual novel in 3D. Lucy works as a waitress at a roadside cafe. She once dreamed of becoming a famous actress, but one day she faced a cruel reality. Can one meeting change her life for the better? This is exactly what you will have to find out!

Jane's Mystery Story (episode 1) is a 2D detective visual novel. Jane lives the life of an ordinary high school student until strange things start to happen to her. Can Jane solve all the secrets, find love and herself? Everything depends only on you!

The Survivor (episode 1) is a story in a post-apocalyptic setting with pixel art style. In the near future, the world has been attacked by an unknown virus and natural disasters. You are one of the few who survived. But are you ready for the twists and turns of fate and new meetings that lie ahead of you?

content_descriptors.notes: Untold Love Stories contains scenes of an erotic nature and strong language.

name: Untold Love Stories

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Untold Love Stories is a collection of visual novels in different genres and styles. Romance, meetings, dangers, adventures and even mystery are waiting for you!
